root.name: Gravity Games Bike: Street Vert Dirt
root.description: HistoryWhen the PS2 version of Gravity Games was released, the reviews were so bad Midway decided to cancel the GameCube version of the game. Everyone also assumed that the Xbox version of the game was also canceled. But for reasons unknown they decided to release the Xbox version exclusively at Costco stores. Midway refused to discuss the game, or even acknowledge its existence, so it will most likely never be known why they decided to release it. SoundtrackThe soundtrack features several rap songs recorded specifically for the game. Interestingly the song's lyrics mentions the names of the programmers and developers who worked on the game. Unfortunately none of the rappers are credited by name, instead they appear as "special guest rappers" in the credits.
